pages.title: ⎧ Two of Wands ⎧
pages.text: Spirit of Dominion$(br)      ♂ Mars in ♈ Aries

A tall figure looks from a battlemented roof over sea and shore.$(br)  They contemplate a globe in their right hand, while a staff in their left rests on the wall; another staff is fixed in a ring to the roof.$(br)  Standing atop their already established domain, they look forward to affix their staff to their next conquest.$(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Control, dominion, power, focused will. The ability to act
in the world.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Openness to change, to giving up power.
